20101231040157.000|20101231040159.000|CC1|>>> WHEN OUR PRODUCERS TRAVELED

20101231040208.000|20101231040210.000|CC1|THE MOST BEAUTIFUL PRISON IN THE

20101231040238.000|20101231040239.000|CC1|WORST BEHAVED PRISONERS END UP  
20101231040239.000|20101231040241.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20101231040241.000|20101231040242.000|CC1|>> THOSE WHO POSE THE GREATEST  
20101231040242.000|20101231040244.000|CC1|THREAT TO OTHER INMATES AND     
20101231040244.000|20101231040245.000|CC1|STAFF ARE SEGREGATED IN HOUSE

20101231040414.000|20101231040421.000|CC1|PREPARED FECES AND URINE FOR US.

20101231040901.000|20101231040902.000|CC1|SPIT HIS FINGER ON THE FLOOR.   
20101231040902.000|20101231040903.000|CC1|>> HE BIT OFF HIS FINGER.       
20101231040903.000|20101231040904.000|CC1|HE DIDN'T SUCCEED IN WHAT HE WAS
20101231040904.000|20101231040906.000|CC1|TRYING TO DO.                   
20101231040906.000|20101231040907.000|CC1|>> HOLDING HIM ON THE GROUND.   
20101231040907.000|20101231040910.000|CC1|DIGGING ONE OF HIS EYEBALLS OUT.
20101231040910.000|20101231040910.000|CC1|I'VE HAD TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES 
20101231040910.000|20101231040911.000|CC1|WITH THAT.                      
20101231040911.000|20101231040912.000|CC1|I'VE BEEN TRYING THAT THE LAST  
20101231040912.000|20101231040914.000|CC1|COUPLE TIMES.                   
20101231040914.000|20101231040915.000|CC1|>> WHAT?                        
20101231040915.000|20101231040918.000|CC1|>> POPPING THEIR EYE OUT.       
20101231040918.000|20101231040920.000|CC1|I BEAT ON THEM AND BROKE THEM.  
20101231040920.000|20101231040922.000|CC1|SO I DECIDED TO TRY BLINDING ONE
20101231040922.000|20101231040923.000|CC1|SEEING IF THAT MAKES THEM       
20101231040923.000|20101231040926.000|CC1|UNDERSTAND TO LEAVE ME ALONE.   
20101231040926.000|20101231040928.000|CC1|>> DURING OUR INTERVIEW, BRIGHT 
20101231040928.000|20101231040929.000|CC1|INDICATED HE STILL MAINTAINS    
20101231040929.000|20101231040931.000|CC1|HOPE IN PRISON AND IF HE EVER   
20101231040931.000|20101231040932.000|CC1|LOSES IT, THERE COULD BE REAL   
20101231040932.000|20101231040933.000|CC1|TROUBLE.

20101231041958.000|20101231042000.000|CC1|SO IN HINDSIGHT, YOU HAVE TO    
20101231042000.000|20101231042001.000|CC1|HOLD YOUR TONGUE AND GO HOME

20101231042024.000|20101231042027.000|CC1|PRESENT DANGER."                
20101231042027.000|20101231042028.000|CC1|>> WHEN YOU STEP OUT OF BOUNDS  
20101231042028.000|20101231042029.000|CC1|AND DISRESPECT SOMEBODY, YOU    
20101231042029.000|20101231042030.000|CC1|BETTER EXPECT THAT SAME

20101231042031.000|20101231042032.000|CC1|>> CELLMATES IN ONE OF AMERICA'S

20101231043904.000|20101231043905.000|CC1|AVOID A CELL EXTRACTION, WHERE  
20101231043905.000|20101231043911.000|CC1|ANYONE CAN BE INJURED.          
20101231043911.000|20101231043921.000|CC1|[ INAUDIBLE ]                   
20101231043921.000|20101231043922.000|CC1|>> FINALLY, ONE INMATE DECIDES  
20101231043922.000|20101231043923.000|CC1|TO COMPLY.

20101231045033.000|20101231045034.000|CC1|THIS GUY, HE KILLED ONE, SO NOW 
20101231045034.000|20101231045037.000|CC1|WE'RE GOING TO GO AND KILL HIM. 
20101231045037.000|20101231045038.000|CC1|>> PROTECTIVE CUSTODY INMATES   
20101231045038.000|20101231045040.000|CC1|LIKE MORGAN ARE LOCKED IN THEIR 
20101231045040.000|20101231045042.000|CC1|CELLS 23 HOURS A DAY TO KEEP    
20101231045042.000|20101231045044.000|CC1|THEM FROM OTHER INMATES.        
20101231045044.000|20101231045046.000|CC1|>> IT'S CLAUSTROPHOBIC BEING IN 
20101231045046.000|20101231045048.000|CC1|A LITTLE CELL 23 HOURS A DAY,   
20101231045048.000|20101231045050.000|CC1|BUT AFTER A WHILE YOU GET USED  
20101231045050.000|20101231045051.000|CC1|TO IT.                          
20101231045051.000|20101231045053.000|CC1|WHAT I MISS MOST ABOUT FREEDOM  
20101231045053.000|20101231045056.000|CC1|IS BEING ABLE TO BE OUTSIDE.    
20101231045056.000|20101231045057.000|CC1|AND I MISS THE SUN.

20101231045058.000|20101231045100.000|CC1|ANYTHING ELSE.

20101231045104.000|20101231045110.000|CC1|TOO GOOD.

20101231045720.000|20101231045721.000|CC1|QUENTIN IS ONE OF THE OLDEST    
20101231045721.000|20101231045729.000|CC1|PRISONS WE VISITED.

20101231045730.000|20101231045732.000|CC1|CORRECTIONAL OFFICER HERE AT SAN
20101231045732.000|20101231045733.000|CC1|QUENTIN, I WAS WORKING GRAVEYARD
20101231045733.000|20101231045734.000|CC1|IN A SECTION CALLED DONNOR.     
20101231045734.000|20101231045735.000|CC1|>> OFFICER FEUDLER IS A MEMBER  
20101231045735.000|20101231045737.000|CC1|OF SAN QUENTIN'S INVESTIGATIVE  
20101231045737.000|20101231045739.000|CC1|SERVICES UNIT, AN ELITE TEAM OF 
20101231045739.000|20101231045740.000|CC1|COs THAT TRACK GANG ACTIVITY AND
20101231045740.000|20101231045741.000|CC1|OTHER THREATS TO THE            
20101231045741.000|20101231045744.000|CC1|INSTITUTION.                    
20101231045744.000|20101231045747.000|CC1|>> ONE NIGHT MY PARTNER AND I

20101231045749.000|20101231045752.000|CC1|FILE CABINET JUST LIKE THIS.

20101231045753.000|20101231045755.000|CC1|THE TOP HANDLE.
